description: This Java class represents a JPA entity for a Note, mapping to the 'notes' table in the database. It includes fields for id, title, content, createdAt, and updatedAt, with lifecycle callbacks for persisting and updating timestamps.

classes.name: Note
classes.description: JPA entity representing a Note stored in the database, with fields for id, title, content, createdAt, and updatedAt, and lifecycle hooks for setting timestamps.

methods.name: static Note newWithId
methods.description: Creates a new Note instance with a generated UUID as its id.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Lifecycle callback for persisting a new Note, sets createdAt, updatedAt, and id if not already set.

methods.name: onUpdate
methods.description: Lifecycle callback for updating an existing Note, updates the updatedAt timestamp.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the id of the note.

methods.name: setId
methods.description: Sets the id of the note.

methods.name: getTitle
methods.description: Returns the title of the note.

methods.name: setTitle
methods.description: Sets the title of the note.

methods.name: getContent
methods.description: Returns the content of the note.

methods.name: setContent
methods.description: Sets the content of the note.
